line_2: Or tease you with his tears.

line_1: Cold looks, forbidding frowns, contemptuous sneers,
line_2: When he hath tamely borne for many years

line_1: Here no false Pride at honest labour sneers,
line_2: Men here are brothers, equal but in years;

line_1: But the next Hour at his Chaplain sneers:
line_2: Now turns to Heav'n with repentant Tears:
